name: HighSensitivityTroponinT
title: High Sensitivity Troponin T
description: The amount of cardiac troponin T in the blood, serum or plasma, calculated by a high sensitivity methodology. (Business ID: Entry 2853217)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing High Sensitivity Troponin T.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an the amount of cardiac troponin t in the blood, serum or plasma, calculated by a high sensitivity methodology..),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for High Sensitivity Troponin T.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating High Sensitivity Troponin T.)
